mapper.sql: ID, `NAME`, MISSIONTITLE, DESCRIPTION, TITLE, TYPE, SIMPLE_TARGET, NORMAL_TARGET, HARD_TARGET, COLOR, CHARACTER_ID, ACTION, STAT_TYPE, NORMAL_ITEMS, VIP_ITEMS, BACK_UP, WEIGHT
mapper.select:
select count(*) from SYS_MISSION where 1=1
and ( ID like '${searchValue}%' or `NAME` like '${searchValue}%' or MISSIONTITLE like '${searchValue}%' or TITLE like '${searchValue}%')
mapper.insert: insert into SYS_MISSION (ID, `NAME`, MISSIONTITLE, DESCRIPTION, TITLE, TYPE, SIMPLE_TARGET, NORMAL_TARGET, HARD_TARGET, COLOR, CHARACTER_ID, ACTION, STAT_TYPE, NORMAL_ITEMS, VIP_ITEMS, BACK_UP, WEIGHT) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{missiontitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{simpleTarget,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{normalTarget,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{hardTarget,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{color,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{characterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{action,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{statType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{normalItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vipItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{backUp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

replace into SYS_MISSION (ID, `NAME`, MISSIONTITLE, DESCRIPTION, TITLE, TYPE, SIMPLE_TARGET, NORMAL_TARGET, HARD_TARGET, COLOR, CHARACTER_ID, ACTION, STAT_TYPE, NORMAL_ITEMS, VIP_ITEMS, BACK_UP, WEIGHT) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.missiontitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.simpleTarget,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.normalTarget,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.hardTarget,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.color,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.characterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.action,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.statType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.normalItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.vipItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.backUp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.weight,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID

mapper.update:
update SYS_MISSION
`NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MISSIONTITLE = #{missiontitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SIMPLE_TARGET = #{simpleTarget,jdbcType=INTEGER},
NORMAL_TARGET = #{normalTarget,jdbcType=INTEGER},
HARD_TARGET = #{hardTarget,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COLOR = #{color,jdbcType=INTEGER},

VIP_ITEMS = #{vipItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BACK_UP = #{backUp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update SYS_MISSION set `NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MISSIONTITLE = #{missiontitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SIMPLE_TARGET = #{simpleTarget,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NORMAL_TARGET = #{normalTarget,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HARD_TARGET = #{hardTarget,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COLOR = #{color,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CHARACTER_ID = #{characterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ACTION = #{action,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STAT_TYPE = #{statType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NORMAL_ITEMS = #{normalItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIP_ITEMS = #{vipItems,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BACK_UP = #{backUp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
